thread.title: Rebecca T
thread.title_full: Buddy Allen Carpet One Floor & Home reviewed by Rebecca T

author: Rebecca T
title: Rebecca T
text: Emory was amazing from the start! He brought samples to me, offered expert knowledge on quality, color and what would work best for my crazy household! The installers took great care in making sure new floors were installed beautifully and efficiently! I was blown away at the look and quality! My expectations were definitely exceeded. Emory then followed up to make sure I was really in love! Thanks guys!!!
